sources.title: American Conjuring | FULL MOVIE | 2016 | Horror, Mystery
sources.description:
American Conjuring Full Movie. A family moves into an abandoned orphanage and they soon learn that their charming orphanage has a disturbing history and are convinced they aren't alone.

Directed by Dan Walton, Dan Zachary
Starring Chloe Bear, Lynn Csontos, Natasha Davidson
2016

Visit our new sister channel, Chicken Soup for the Soul TV, for even more full movie uploads every week! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCofXdbFoiyYOHu-rVFmtjvQ
